title: Eigendata settings
description: Here you can configure the settings for Eigendata.

transformationAuth.title: Authentication for transformation server
transformationAuth.description: Authentication to get transformations from a remote server.

shareProductData.title: Share product data
shareProductData.description: This setting determines if product data is shared. We don't keep your identity, and only record which transformations are used to help us better invest time improving the product.

answeredProductDataDialog.title: User consent requested
answeredProductDataDialog.description: Property to validate that user consent for product data has been asked

completedProductTour.title: Completed Product Tour
completedProductTour.description: Turn true if you want to see the initial tutorial again

simplifyMenus.title: Simplify menus
simplifyMenus.description: Remove top-level menus to declutter the interface. All commands can be accessed through the command palette.

simplifySidebars.title: Simplify Sidebars
simplifySidebars.description: Remove sidebars to declutter the interface
